attributes.action: Charge Fines (speeding, reckless driving etc) Proportionate to Income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why should people on average earnings pay the same for a speeding ticket as someone who is a multi-millionaire. I think people who can afford to pay more should pay more. To me a £300 fine is a lot of money, to a multi-millionaire like a footballer, it is pocket money. I think this needs to be changed.
